tool_description: Predicts future demand for products using historical sales data and seasonal patterns.

product_id.description: Product SKU or ID to forecast demand for

historical_start_date.description: Start date for historical data analysis

historical_end_date.description: End date for historical data analysis

forecast_days.description: Number of days ahead to forecast (1-365)

seasonality.description: Whether to account for seasonal patterns

error_messages: Insufficient historical data: Need at least 30 days of sales history. Extend historical date range.
Invalid forecast period: forecast_days must be between 1 and 365 days.
Invalid confidence level: confidence_level must be between 0.8 and 0.99.
Product not found: The specified product_id does not exist in sales records.
usage: Specify product_id, historical date range, and forecast_days. Optionally enable seasonality analysis and set confidence_level for prediction intervals.

predicted_daily_demand.description: Predicted demand for each day in the forecast period

total_predicted_demand.description: Sum of predicted demand over the entire forecast period

confidence_interval_lower.description: Lower bound of confidence interval for each day

confidence_interval_upper.description: Upper bound of confidence interval for each day
